name: Torchance 6
description:
In Torchance 6, you take on the role of an aspiring football manager.

Up to 4 players can take on the task of managing all aspects of a football club.

Unlike other football management games, you can easily complete an entire season in less than 60 minutes if you wish. This makes this game ideal for a quick round or two when you only have a few spare minutes.

It's your choice:
  • Manage your own club and start in the 8th division.
  • Take over an existing team from the European top leagues.
  • Complete challenges.
  • and lead your team to success.
  • Torchance 6 returns to the virtues of classic football managers with an eye on the essentials.

Back to the roots:
Torchance 6 offers everything a good football manager needs.
Be it advertising, merchandising, transfer market, statistics, stadium expansion, expansion of the stadium environment, youth development, training camps, training, tactics, etc.

Torchance 6 offers numerous playing options:
Play in international leagues, master challenges, watch the game, etc. in text mode and negotiate, train and manage in detail.

Extensive league system:
8 leagues including numerous championships in almost 200 countries.

Extensive editor:
With the editor, players and club names can be changed and adapted as required.
With a face editor you can create your own player portraits.

From fans for fans:
Torchance 6 is developed by fans who can look back on 27 years of experience with football management games and who have a passion for football in their blood.

Features:
  • Playable in German and English
  • 1-4 players on one PC
  • German and English language
  • Different game modes (found a club in the 8th league / take over club / accept challenges)
  • 5 different levels of difficulty
  • 196 countries
  • Matchday: text mode, scoreboard, 2D game mode
  • Comprehensive management: finances, squad planning, stadium expansion and construction, sponsors, training camps
  • Become a national coach and take part in European and World Cups
  • Licensing requirements to play in higher leagues
  • National and international cup competitions
  • Friendly matches
  • Hi-Score and Online Hi-Score
  • Newspaper Reports (can be switched off)
  • Random events
  • Comprehensive editor
